exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros net d p p' H. unfold pt_map_packet in H. destruct p as [src dst m]. destruct (pt_map_msg m) eqn:Hmsg. - inversion H; subst; clear H. simpl. apply f_equal. apply f_equal with (f:= fun n => pt_map_data (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) dst d (tot_map_name_inv n))). apply to_net_inv_eq. - inversion H.
